useCase.name: Booking Football Pitch
useCase.description: Allows a Customer to book a football pitch for a specific time slot.

preconditions.precondition: The Customer must be logged in.

successEndConditions.condition: The football pitch is successfully booked.

useCase.trigger: Customer selects a football pitch and a time slot for booking.

mainSequence.step: System sends the selected time slot.
System checks the availability of the time slot in the football pitch.
